comment._content:
These unemployed workers look better then our movie stars, politicians and millionaires do today.
Where did we go wrong?

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps to do with the 'alien labor law' and the difficulty of getting subway contracts finished without hiring aliens. See NYT of March 3, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00814FA395C1373...
